creditline: Gift of the Joseph F. McCrindle Collection
description: woman wearing a lace collar with pulled-back hair, in black and red chalk; labeled in black ink on the image: #86; mounted on sheet with 2 other small drawings--further drawings have been removed; other drawings present are labeled: #85, #87; see L2009.52.66a and L2009.52.66c
provenance: Sale, Christie's, London, April 15, 1980, as "Property of a Gentleman," lot 53, as workshop of Cavaliere d'Arpino, with 2009.53.65a-d to McCrindle; Joseph F. McCrindle, New York (until d. 2008); Joseph F. McCrindle Foundation (2008-2009; gave to MIA)
title: Portrait of Woman
